mapper.insert: insert into SWSJB (ZD, SCSJ, LY, SZSF, LYMC, SW, LL, JJSW) values (#{zd,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{scsj,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, #{ly,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{szsf,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{lymc,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{sw,jdbcType=NUMERIC}, #{ll,jdbcType=NUMERIC}, #{jjsw,jdbcType=NUMERIC})
mapper.select: select ZD, SCSJ, LY, SZSF, LYMC, SW, LL, JJSW from SWSJB
